extDesc.message: Remove specific search results from Google and Bing.

settingsBtnTitle.description: The title for the settings button.

suggestedDomains.description: Header for the suggested domains section.

addDomainPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field to add a new domain.

addDomainBtnTitle.description: Title for the add domain button.

backBtnTitle.description: Title for the back button in the settings view.

settingsTitle.description: The title of the settings section.

activeOnWebsites.description: Header for the section to enable/disable the extension on specific websites.

languageSettings.description: The title of the language settings section.

comingSoon.description: Text for features that are not yet implemented.

noDomainsAdded.message: No domains added yet. Add one above!
noDomainsAdded.description: Message displayed when the list of blocked domains is empty.

noSuggestionsFound.message: No domain suggestions found from current page.
noSuggestionsFound.description: Message displayed when no domain suggestions are available.

domainAddedSuccess.description: Success message when a domain is added.

domainAlreadyBlocked.message: '$domain$' is already in your blocked list.
domainAlreadyBlocked.description: Error message when trying to add a domain that is already blocked.

pleaseEnterDomain.description: Error message when the user tries to add an empty domain.

suggestionsUnavailable.message: Suggestions are only available on Google and Bing search results pages.
suggestionsUnavailable.description: Message displayed when domain suggestions are not available.

removeDomainBtnTitle.description: Title for the remove domain button.

addSuggestionBtn.description: Text for the button to add a suggested domain.
